729448f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Jewett Avenue
729448f-a.text:
Richmond Terrace, north side, west from Bodines Pond (west of Clove Road) to Jewett Avenue. Part of the sign,which is a fire-insurance advertisement, reads: "Mrs O'Dooley's Cow knocked over the lamp which started the Great Chicago Fire.
Not the Cow's Fault."

March 5, 1927
P. L. Sperr
729448f-a.folder: Richmond Terrace & Jewett Avenue, Staten Island, NY
